translations: 被剥夺财产和公民权；剥夺公权

sentences.sentence: But because of its incertitude, public interest easily become the excuse to harm the attainder.
sentences.translation: 但由于公共利益的不确定性，又使得公共利益容易成为损害公民权利的借口。

sentences.sentence: Pass any bill of attainder ex post facto law or law impairing the obligation of contracts or grant any title of nobility.
sentences.translation: 不得通过任何褫夺公权的法案、追溯既往的法律和损害契约义务的法律；也不得颁发任何贵族爵位。

sentences.sentence: Pass any bill of attainder ex post facto law or law impairing the obligation of contracts or grant any title of nobility .
sentences.translation: 不得通过任何褫夺公权的法案、追溯既往的法律和损害契约义务的法律；也不得颁发任何贵族爵位。
